body_html: Sorry @aaroey, it looks like kokoro is removing force-run once the run is started. I pushed some fixes for FAILs in sanity tests but they are not run again. Is there any other flag to have them automatically run or do you need to add force-run every time?
body_text: Sorry @aaroey, it looks like kokoro is removing force-run once the run is started. I pushed some fixes for FAILs in sanity tests but they are not run again. Is there any other flag to have them automatically run or do you need to add force-run every time?
body: Sorry @aaroey, it looks like kokoro is removing force-run once the run is started. I pushed some fixes for FAILs in sanity tests but they are not run again. Is there any other flag to have them automatically run or do you need to add force-run every time?
